name: Teyvat Memory Cards
description:
Teyvat Memory Cards (TMC) is a hyper-casual card game in which the goal  is to pass all the levels against the clock and take the first place in the leaderboard by getting enough points. You're able to unlock all achievements, choose the difficulty of levels. Also TMC is multilangual. The languages of  the game are : English, Ukrainian, Russian. TMC has all the characters  from Genshin Impact at the time of version 2.8.0 of Genshin Impact!  You can run this game on any system from the web. You can also download the installer of TMC on dekstop for Windows (7/8/10) x32 and x64.

Controls

Use the left mouse button to open cards.

Might be useful

If you see a black screen in the game in browser and nothing happens, try this:
Under Chrome's Settings > Privacy > Content settings, you have the cookie setting set to to "Block sites from setting any data".  This checkbox is what is causing the black screen.

If it's not helped, you can download the game.

Credits

Teyvat Memory Cards (TMC) was made for non-commercial personal use. 

For more information, click this article and read on number 2.

Game Developer of the game : Valentyn Troian.

 P.S. This is my first game! I hope, you'll enjoy it ^_^
